DOC.brief_summary: This proof concept study propose evaluate feasibility communications-technology-based chronic care patient relationship management program improve diabetes self management among adult diabetic patient urban safety net population provide between-visit reminder chronic disease support cell phone text messaging . The investigator hypothesize diabetic patient enrol program less likely miss schedule appointment great perceive self-efficacy improved patient satisfaction concern chronic disease management . No-show rate among patient enrol program expect low among patient receive standard care .
